config:
added to 2
tdex_tport.xml tdex_hosts.xml
MamaSubscExpire 0.0
MamaDataDictResponder false
WmwSource TDEX
SymbolAnnounceSymbolFormat _ANNOUNCE
LiffeConnectEnableInternalHeartbeat true
StatsResetTime 00:00:00.00 Asia/Tokyo
MaxOrderBookSize 30
LiffeConnectStoreMessagesForMissingStrategy true
LiffeConnectAddAllContracts true
OrdersPerRecord 30
LiffeConnectLogonIfNoStrategies true
LiffeConnectUseLineTimeForBookTime false
LiffeConnectClearCacheOnLogon false
PublishCalculatedImpliedInAsQuote true
LiffeConnectUseInternalQueue false
LiffeConnectUseTimedInitialization true
LiffeConnectUseInternalSequenceNumber true
CalculateImpliedInPrice true
ExplicitNoPriceValue 999999999 For some feeds, the feed itself transmits a specific value to indicate that a given quote no longer has a price. The above value is the default value sent from the exchange. Change this parameter to use a different value.
LiffeConnectPublishSyntheticTrades true
LiffeConnectPublishSyntheticTradeSaleCondition true
StrategyPublishNumberOfLegs true
SupportedStrategyTypes CalendarSpread Butterfly Condor Spread Ladder 2x1RatioSpread Strangle Straddle Strip Pack Bundle DiagonalCalendarSpread List of strategy types that will be handled by the RecordHandlerStrategy module.
ImpliedPricingIgnoredInstrumentTypes Future List of instrument types that do not support implied price matching.
PublishStrategyTypeUsingRecordHandlerStrategy true
StrategyCheckModifiedBeforeUpdateBestPrices true
PublishImmediateStrategyLegUpdate true
RecordPublisherUseSentinel true
PublishGroupRecords true
GenerateGroupSymbol true
RecordHandlerOrderBookEnableGroups true
UseLineFilter false
OrderBookUpdateImpliesNormalStatus false
UseRawOrderBookClear false Set to true to enable clearOrderBook and clearAllOrderBooks WAM commands for tdex
MdrvPrefix TDEX MDRV publishing interface
LiffeConnectPubSecStatusEnum true
LiffeConnectFilterOnExchangeName false
LiffeConnectExchangeName TDEX Not required in LiffeConnectFilterOnExchangeName is set to 'false'
LiffeConnectExchangeCodes E F G I J S T
"E" - TSE Equity Options "F" - TSE TOPIX Futures "G" - TSE JGB Futures "I" - TSE TOPIX Indexes "J" - TSE JGB Options "S" - TSE Equities "T" - TSE TOPIX Options
LiffeConnectUseExchangeCodeProductMappings true
LiffeConnectEquityOptionsExchangeCode E
LiffeconnectStrategyExchangeCode $
LiffeConnectUseLegCommodityCodeForStrategy true
OptionPublishSymbology Native
FuturePublishSymbology Native
StrategyPublishSymbology Native
ExtraInfoPublishSymbologySeparator No value
LiffeConnectUseGlobalGroupSymbolForEquities true
LiffeConnectEquitiesGlobalGroupSymbol EquitiesGroup
LiffeConnectUseGlobalGroupSymbolForIndex true
LiffeConnectIndexGlobalGroupSymbol IndexGroup
LiffeConnectTrimSpacesInAmrCode true
LiffeConnectUs true
LiffeConnectPublishGroupChains false
PublishLinkRecords false
RecordHandlerLinkNew false
TradeCalculateVwap false
SslSourceName TDEX
SslPublisherType broadcast
RecordAttrs RecordAttrsNormal
TdexAutomaticRollBeforeEveningSession true
OrderBookData true
DefaultTimeZone Asia/Tokyo
NativeTimeZone Asia/Tokyo
PublishTopOfBook false
CalculateTopOfBook false
TopOfBookDecimals 4
PublishFullOrderBook false
InitialMode Sleep
LineDataFormat basic
MessageRecoveryFile
PublishAllRate 1000
LiffeConnectConvertTickPrice true
LiffeConnectApplyStrategyPriceDenominator true
RecordPublisherDelayInitialize true
LiffeConnectHandleOutOfSyncStrategySecStatus true
LiffeChainProductName TdexProduct
FieldAttrs FieldAttrsCommon FieldAttrsOption FieldAttrsFuture FieldAttrsQuote FieldAttrsChain FieldAttrsTrade FieldAttrsOrderBookMsg FieldAttrsOrderBookWombatMsg FieldAttrsOrderListPart FieldAttrsFundamental FieldAttrsSecurityStatus FieldAttrsStatus FieldAttrsReuters FieldAttrsIce FieldAttrsItc FieldAttrsStrategy FieldAttrsTradeOptional FieldAttrsCorpAct
tdex
NamedThreads thread_liffeconnect thread_poll_liffeconnect thread_poll_liffeconnect required for internal queue
UseNamedThread thread_liffeconnect thread_poll_liffeconnect
thread_liffeconnect
Enabled true
IsMsgHandling false
IsMsgSending true
IsSessionThread true
thread_poll_liffeconnect
Enabled true
IsCreated true
IsMsgHandling false
IsMsgSending true
IsSessionThread false
